seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Sr Data Engineer' and requires 5+ years experience, which aligns perfectly with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL workflows, and data architecture - classic data engineering role

sub_specialty.evidence: Job focuses on 'ETL workflows', 'data pipelines', and 'large-scale data processing' with no streaming or real-time mentions

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'mentor and guide junior data engineers', 'technical leadership', and 'lead projects' but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery equally - no single cloud dominates

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers mentioned as primary technologies

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on 'ETL workflows', 'scheduled data processing', and 'data pipelines' with no real-time or streaming mentions

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as workflow orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery - all data warehouse technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite role in Minneapolis, MN with 'no remote work' - requires being in specific metro area

timezone_focus.evidence: Located in Minneapolis, MN which is in Central Time Zone, Americas region

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role with no remote work implies candidates must relocate to Minneapolis area

h1b_friendly.evidence: E-Verify employer but no mention of H1B sponsorship, and onsite requirement may limit international candidates

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Requires 5+ years experience and senior-level role, suggesting not suitable for students

citizenship_required.evidence: E-Verify employer states 'authorized to work in US' requirement but no citizenship restriction mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including medical/dental/vision, 401k, ESPP, HSA, FSA, mentorship, training, tuition reimbursement, paid parental leave - 3+ premium benefits

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'career development support', 'promotional opportunities', and 'mentorship' but no specific career tracks outlined

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states 'mentorship' as benefit and 'mentor and guide junior data engineers' as responsibility

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Mentions both technical leadership (mentoring, tech lead) and 'promotional opportunities' suggesting multiple advancement paths

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'essential functions' (must-haves) and preferred qualifications like Master's degree and certifications

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific technical responsibilities and clear job boundaries

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5+ years for senior level is appropriate, and skill requirements align with senior data engineer expectations
